meanings.definition: A small, sweet, fruit-flavored candy or gelatin dessert.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat a jube after dinner as a little treat.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed the colorful jubes at the birthday party.
meanings.sent3: She giggled as she popped a jube into her mouth, pretending it was a magic potion.
meanings.sent4: The jellied jubes glistened like precious gems in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The jube melted on his tongue, releasing bursts of fruity flavor.

meanings.definition: A joyful or celebratory shout or exclamation.
meanings.sent1: The crowd erupted in a loud jube when the team scored a goal.
meanings.sent2: Her jube of happiness echoed through the room when she received good news.
meanings.sent3: The jube of excitement from the audience was deafening as the curtains rose.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like it was filled with a warm jube of joy at the sight of his family.
meanings.sent5: The jube of victory in his voice was unmistakable as he crossed the finish line.
